channel.title: 2 things i need help pl0x help me
channel.description:
:) im currently working on xlinepkscape1-15 i neeed some help to make my server kick ass :)
right i have this server called xlinescape[not myn] it has difernt colur walls :P i wuld like some 1 to help me do that please [and how do i add a range stand in dummy room 2]
2)how do u add shops i dont get it how u make shops can some 1 teech me or like add me on msn i do need some help bad ways :p here my msn is badboyben_2007@hotmail.co.uk
thank you [i will give u adminship on my kick ass serverr
ps [how do i change my tele porting spots] and the names ty ;) ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 03:24:26 PM[/size][hr]please[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 03:30:05 PM[/size][hr]please

omg im sick of fucking pricks omg i wish i lived where u did m8 id smash ur fucking head in u dont no me i started playing runescape because i moved to uk from states so stuf u gay n0b head[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 04:39:38 PM[/size][hr]can u help me or not this isnt a disiin match u n0b head go suck ur dead nan ur moms a hore she was sucking bin lardens bombs[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 04:40:31 PM[/size][hr]im removeing this u dont like my lay ut il inprove k

item.title: 2 things i need help pl0x help me

item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

everyone tries to be perfect don’t they?..and he said, “i’ll let you be admin on my kick ass server”…for one, and for two, “leet speek” is gay…and only nerds speak like that…three, his questions are kind of pointless, what’s it matter if his walls are grey or if they’re pink?..

item.source: 2 things i need help pl0x help me

item.title: 2 things i need help pl0x help me
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

LeScape Pk:

1. You’re a nerd, Get a life, “someone pl0x help me”?.. 2. Those are the most ridiculous questions i’ve ever heard…if you’re server is so “kick ass” then why would you need our help; and 90% of the time, you don’t really admin people who will help, they play the forget game and say “who are you?”, so I’ve given up people 3. You say “i’ve got this server called xlinepk(not mine)”, then why say “I’ve got this server” if it isn’t yours? 4. Dude…try asking the actual owner of the server?

  1. He is not a nerd, he’s just using ‘leet speak’, which I don’t use, don’t care to use, have never used, will never used, but it does not make him a nerd.

  2. They are not ridiculous, they are questions that any new person asks. He did not say it was kick ass, he asked HOW to make it kick ass, and he’s on the right track. You learn from asking. Also, anyone who isn’t stuck up wouldn’t mind not getting admin ship to answer a few questions.

  3. Unless you create your own source from scratch, you’ve used someone else’s source also. If you follow your logic, no one would have their own server.

  4. This is the Help/Development Section, you ask questions here. An owner of an actual source might not reply at all.

Think before you talk

Owned, there are tutorials for all of your questions, I’ll try to get them for you. Also, don’t triple post.

Read full topic
